This is a Visual Basic program so that means that we can use VBReFormer to get a better disassembly than what we would get using ghidra or Binary Ninja. Inside the â€œModule1â€ object we can find var_7 being initialized with the value of the password. Giving â€œ8YL4-H4LL-HLAH-WH6R-1K6Câ€ as the input will turn the form object green and open â€œForm2â€.
